___stage_to.description: The stage of the receiving entity, to be selected in the list of allowed values

___public.description: Whether the interaction can be viewed by all users

___environment.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the environments associated to the interaction.

___item_to.description: Identifier (or URI) of the item receiving the interaction.

___item_from.description: Identifier (or URI) of the item establishing the interaction.

___sex_from.description: The sex of the establishing, to be selected in the list of allowed values

___units_f.description: Units in which the interaction strength is measured

___sex_to.description: The sex of the receiving entity, to be selected in the list of allowed values

___date.description: The time at which the interaction was sampled

___data.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the references describing the data.

___units_t.description: Units in which the interaction strength is measured

___papers.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the references to the papers associated with the dataset.

___taxa_from.description: Identifier (or URI) of the taxa establishing the interaction.

___stage_from.description: The stage of the establishing entity, to be selected in the list of allowed values

___strength_t.description: The strength of the interaction for the item RECEVING the interaction

___taxa_to.description: Identifier (or URI) of the taxa receiving the interaction.

___owner.description: Who uploaded the data. URI of the data owner.

___strength_f.description: The strength of the interaction for the item ESTABLISHING the interaction
